word: This is the website for 'THE WIFE OF THEM ALL' (2022) - a film by Rebecca Close
official selection for the 27th LESGAICINEMAD film festival in Madrid

This website playfully uses 'local storage' (similar to cookies) to draw attention to the complicity of the viewer in creating meaning & value via the screen - which is one of the main themes of the film
animation with Meri Varó; camera with Noel López; drawing contribution by Violeta Ospina
Sabrina Michelle Rivera Sánchez (Coordinator at Sexwork Europe) as 'Fran'
Alejandra Durga Ramos (Member of Sindihogar Union of Domestic workers in Barcelona) as 'Julia'
a family based accross continents critique and move beyond borders - mad bureaucracy & precarious work
The characters use their creative experience as workers to transform their environment
Aesthetically linking histories of clay animation film; time-lapse microscopy & feminist video art
The film lies at the intersection of documentary & science fiction
A sci-fi heist plot unique in addressing the billion dollar global fertility market in relation to migratory control
In a world dominated by visuals that centre the human face - this animation film pursues intimacy through the wildly diverse worlds of texture & voice
a spoken opera about reproductive labour & sexuality – inspired by Gertrude Stein's libretto The Mother of Us All (1947)
